scripts.services:up: docker-compose -f docker-compose.development.yml --env-file .env up -d || docker compose -f docker-compose.development.yml --env-file .env up -d
scripts.services:stop: docker-compose -f docker-compose.development.yml --env-file .env stop || docker compose -f docker-compose.development.yml --env-file .env stop
scripts.services:down: docker-compose -f docker-compose.development.yml --env-file .env down || docker compose -f docker-compose.development.yml --env-file .env down
